This is kinda like the 40k of hentai: it's grim, it's gritty, it has its own beauty, but in the end, no one would like this kind of hentai to happen. I believe UMP45 (as well as all the other shell-shocked T-Dolls) will be able to heal in time, but it doesn't make it easier for me to see her like this.

That wall of text under me is scaring me

@sexyrobot69, 45 is basically suffering from major PTSD from past events which leaves her completely emotionally isolating herself from everyone outside of her squad (and even to some extent in her squad). Because of this, she has a false persona which she keeps up and is what everyone, including the commander, interacts with.
This whole relationship with the commander is probably completely superficial to her as she doesn't feel any pleasure and likely puts up with it for her own benefit.

I should have paid attention to the "emotionless sex" tag. 
Was hoping for a happy vanilla doujin, but this was sad; I feel bad for 45 knowing that she struggles with that trauma of hers.
Doesn't help that the Commander is a moron who asked a copletely left field question.

Note: I know it's fiction. I just didn't like how sad it was.

@sexyrobot69, I've never seen Girl's Frontline as well so take my opinion with a grain of salt. From what I've read, Ump45 is just reciprocating girl's moans in order to please the MC. This is pretty hurtful to him as it is to any man. Just like page 19, MC said that it has always bothered him that Ump45 hides a side from him. At page 26, MC noticed Ump45's eyes which are nothing like a human's, he switches positions but he's also noticed her fake moans. This turns MC off, signaling the end of the copulation. This is one of those manga that will need more than one comment to prove it's depth. I haven't seen Girl's Frontline as well so I wouldn't know the lore or character dev. All I learned from reading this is that Ump45 is trying her best to be like a woman to MC, MC cannot help but notice that she isn't because his past memories of her. Ump45 is a more detailed character but, then again, I cannot comprehend as I haven't seen it as well.

Never seen Girl's Frontline, so I really have no idea what the fuck is going on. I read this one after nutting - gotta open like a million doujins before finally starting, yanno? Well, I was trying to figure out if I should save it for later. Normally I just sample the first few pages to see if I like it, but the plot actually kept me going to the end. This in depth explanation of my fapping habits is really just a roundabout way of trying to say: I'm sincerely intrigued by what I just read, and if somebody could explain it, I'd appreciate it. Baoleer's explanation covers the basics but he's only one dude speaking in broken english, so I'm curious what others have to say.

Guys don‘t you know women fake moan or something？Which couple would care about a little faking in their relationship？Never think too much.UMP45 is just a doll designed for kill and she has little inactive feeling like a human girl.However she‘s usually trying to act like a girl，even though she‘s a machine or a demon inside.She had paid too much but the commander just began to realize.At the end she tried to moan the first time and didn't do well so the commander noticed.If she really don't want him to know her more，she would never admit she faked.That‘s all.Not so depressing，not so deep，but a good doujin，not just some pages for fap.

@emiru97, I honestly am small af as well and hitting late teens to early 20s almost hits the peak of our growth. There's no helping your situation, like mine, but think about it. You really didn't do anything wrong, you never confessed did you? Even if you did, you didn't have that much time to get to know her, you are merely infatuated or attracted to her because of her external factors. You clearly didn't have a chance to get to know 100% of her personality (not saying you need to before getting married, but it's ideal). Plus, what's stopping you from being friends with her? You said she's nerdy and kind, well not all heterosexual relationships have to end in romance, right? (please don't be a troll ISTFG)

I believe the implication is she’s looking at something else (though some kind of AR system or something) And so he decides to turn her around to try to ignore it, but it’s a bit difficult to actually tell if that’s what’s happening. Also, this is like, not even porn...It’s more like a depressing rendition of what the author believes a relationship with 45 would look like, that also happens to have sex in it. idk how someone is supposed to fap to this.
